alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 01 at 3:11AM MDT until September 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Tooele and Rush Valleys and Western Millard and Juab Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers, along east-west running routes including I-80.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
